# banner_nicou11

```
    _   ___                 ______
   / | / (_)________  __  _<  <  /
  /  |/ / / ___/ __ \/ / / / // /
```

## **Install**
```
$ pip install banner_nicou11
```

## **Usage**

type:
```
$ show-banner
```

## **Reference**
https://github.com/pwaller/pyfiglet
